description:
FinOps dashboard from the Cloud Optimisation and Accountability Team
💰🌍

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT (sum(line_item_unblended_cost) * 100.0) / (
		SELECT sum(line_item_unblended_cost)
		FROM $__table where line_item_unblended_cost > 0 
  and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)
	) AS business_unit
FROM $__table
where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
	and resource_tags['user_business_unit'] != ''
  and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)

SELECT (sum(line_item_unblended_cost) * 100.0) / (
		SELECT sum(line_item_unblended_cost)
		FROM $__table where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
  and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)
	) AS application
FROM $__table
where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
	and resource_tags['user_application'] != ''
  and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)

SELECT (sum(line_item_unblended_cost) * 100.0) / (
		SELECT sum(line_item_unblended_cost)
		FROM $__table where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
		  and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)
	) AS namespace
FROM $__table
where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
	and resource_tags['user_namespace'] != ''
  and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)

SELECT (sum(line_item_unblended_cost) * 100.0) / (
		SELECT sum(line_item_unblended_cost)
		FROM $__table where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
		 and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)
	) AS environment
FROM $__table
where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
	and resource_tags['user_namespace'] != ''
and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)

SELECT (sum(line_item_unblended_cost) * 100.0) / (
		SELECT sum(line_item_unblended_cost)
		FROM $__table where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
		 and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)
	) AS service_area
FROM $__table
where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
	and resource_tags['user_service_area'] != ''
and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)

SELECT (sum(line_item_unblended_cost) * 100.0) / (
		SELECT sum(line_item_unblended_cost)
		FROM $__table where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
		 and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)
	) AS Owner
FROM $__table
where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
	and resource_tags['user_owner'] != ''
and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)

SELECT (sum(line_item_unblended_cost) * 100.0) / (
		SELECT sum(line_item_unblended_cost)
		FROM $__table where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
		 and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)
	) AS is_production
FROM $__table
where line_item_unblended_cost > 0
	and resource_tags['user_owner'] != ''
and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_owner'] in ($owner) OR concat($owner ,'') = '_ALL_')
  and (resource_tags['user_is_production'] in ($isProducation) OR concat($isProducation ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and billing_period  in ($period)

select 
  line_item_usage_start_date,
  round(sum(line_item_unblended_cost), 2) as cost from $__table 
WHERE (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
and (resource_tags['user_namespace']  in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
and (resource_tags['user_service_area']  in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
and (line_item_line_item_type not in ('Tax'))
and billing_period  in ($period)
group by 1
order by 1

select product_region_code,
	round(sum(line_item_unblended_cost)) as cost
from $__table() 
where product_region_code != ''
	and line_item_unblended_cost > 0
	and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_line_item_type not in ('Tax'))
	and billing_period  in ($period)
group by product_region_code
order by cost desc

select resource_tags['user_environment_name'] as env, sum(line_item_unblended_cost) as cost 
from $__table() 
where  line_item_unblended_cost > 0
	and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name in ($account)  OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_line_item_type not in ('Tax'))
	and billing_period  in ($period)
	group by resource_tags['user_environment_name']
	order by cost desc

panels.description: Splitting costs for EKS for the specified namespace(s)

targets.rawSQL:
select sum(split_line_item_split_cost) as used,  sum(split_line_item_unused_cost) as unused from $__table where 
(resource_tags['aws_eks_namespace'] in ($namespace))
	and billing_period  in ($period)

panels.title: Split costs

targets.rawSQL:
select resource_tags['user_business_unit'],
	round(sum(line_item_unblended_cost)) as cost
from $__table() 
where 
	line_item_unblended_cost > 0
	and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
	and (line_item_line_item_type not in ('Tax'))
	and billing_period  in ($period)
group by resource_tags['user_business_unit']
order by cost desc

select product['product_name'],
  round(sum(line_item_unblended_cost),2) as cost 
FROM $__table
WHERE line_item_unblended_cost > 0 
 and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_')
 and (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
 and (line_item_usage_account_name  in ($account) OR concat($account,'') = '_ALL_') 
 and (resource_tags['user_namespace'] in ($namespace) OR concat($namespace ,'') = '_ALL_')
 and (resource_tags['user_service_area'] in ($serviceArea) OR concat($serviceArea ,'') = '_ALL_')
 and (line_item_line_item_type not in ('Tax'))
 and billing_period  in ($period)
group by product['product_name']
ORDER BY cost DESC 
LIMIT 10;

select resource_tags['user_namespace'], sum(line_item_unblended_cost) as cost from $__table 
where resource_tags['user_namespace'] != '' and  billing_period  in ($period)
group by resource_tags['user_namespace'] order by cost desc limit 10

select resource_tags['user_application'], sum(line_item_unblended_cost) as cost from $__table  
where resource_tags['user_application'] != '' 	and billing_period  in ($period)
group by resource_tags['user_application'] order by cost desc limit 10

select line_item_usage_account_name, sum(line_item_unblended_cost) as cost from $__table 
where line_item_usage_account_name != '' 	and billing_period  in ($period)
group by line_item_usage_account_name order by cost desc limit 10

query.rawSQL: select distinct resource_tags['user_business_unit'] from $__table where billing_period  in ($period)

SELECT DISTINCT resource_tags['user_service_area'] FROM $__table WHERE
 	(resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
 and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_') and billing_period  in ($period)
SELECT DISTINCT resource_tags['user_application'] FROM $__table where (resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_') and billing_period  in ($period)

select distinct line_item_usage_account_name
from $__table
where 
	(resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_') and billing_period  in ($period)

SELECT DISTINCT resource_tags['user_namespace'] FROM $__table where
 	(resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
 and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_') and billing_period  in ($period)

SELECT DISTINCT resource_tags['user_owner'] FROM $__table where
 	(resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
 and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_') and billing_period  in ($period)

SELECT DISTINCT resource_tags['user_is_production'] FROM $__table where
 	(resource_tags['user_business_unit'] in ($unit) OR concat($unit,'') = '_ALL_')
 and (resource_tags['user_application'] in ($application) OR concat($application,'') = '_ALL_') and billing_period  in ($period)

title: FinOps
